__e: You could sit right by me and Grandpa.
You know, I don't think I've ever hung out with you and Grandpa at the same time.
Grandpa Aang and his friends were around our age when they traveled the world.
Of course, Daddy-O, you can talk to me any time about anything.
Why, he's beautiful, I mean... grandpa, you know it could possibly be a girl, right?
Hey, pops, isn't there a better way to spend your twilight years?
